Scene:
The Earthen Bridge (See also The Earthen Bridge from ""The Story of Kasane"")
(Dobashi (See also Dobashi from ""Meiboku kasane monogatari"") / 土橋)

Play: The Trouble in the Date Household (伽羅先代萩)

Production: September 1972

– Click image to view.
